targets.rawSql:
WITH deployed_releases AS (
	select 
		d.repository,
		max(string_to_array(d.version, '.')::int[]) as version,
		max(r.release_time) as release_time,
		max(d.deployment_time) as deployment_time
	from
		deployments d
	left join
		releases r
	on r.version = d.version
	where d.environment ilike 'prod%'
	group by d.repository
	order by repository asc
	)
SELECT
	count(r.version) as version
FROM
	releases r,
	deployed_releases d
WHERE
	r.repository = d.repository AND
	r.release_time > d.release_time;

WITH deployed_releases AS (
	select 
		d.repository,
		max(string_to_array(d.version, '.')::int[]) as version,
		max(r.release_time) as release_time,
		max(d.deployment_time) as deployment_time
	from
		deployments d
	left join
		releases r
	on r.version = d.version
	where d.environment ilike 'prod%'
	group by d.repository
	order by repository asc
	)
SELECT
  r.release_time as "time",
	r.repository as metric,
	count(r.version) as version
FROM
	releases r,
	deployed_releases d
WHERE
	r.repository = d.repository AND
	r.release_time > d.release_time
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY metric ASC;

SELECT
  count (distinct author)
FROM
  pull_requests
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(creation_time)

SELECT
  sum (reviews)
FROM
  pull_requests
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(creation_time)

SELECT
  count(1)
FROM
  pull_requests
WHERE
  ($__timeFilter(creation_time) OR $__timeFilter(ready_for_review_time) OR $__timeFilter(approved_time) OR $__timeFilter(merged_time))

SELECT
  approved_time as "time",
  time_to_review
FROM
  pull_requests
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(approved_time)

SELECT
  case when state='open' then creation_time when state='closed' and merged_time is not null then merged_time else creation_time end as "time",
  case when state='open' then 'open' when state='closed' and merged_time is not null then 'merged' else 'closed' end as "metric",
  1 as "value"
FROM pull_requests
WHERE
  ($__timeFilter(creation_time) OR $__timeFilter(merged_time))
ORDER BY 1,2

WITH one AS (
	SELECT
		repository,
		release_time,
		lag(release_time) OVER (ORDER BY repository, release_time) AS previous_release_time,
		release_time - lag(release_time) OVER (ORDER BY repository, release_time) AS diff
	FROM releases
	),
	two AS (
	SELECT
		repository,
		release_time,
		case when extract (epoch from diff) > 0 then extract (epoch from diff) else 0 end as diff_seconds
	FROM one
	)
SELECT
  percentile_cont(0.5) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY diff_seconds) as median,
  stddev_pop(diff_seconds) as stddev
FROM two
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(release_time)

SELECT
  count(1)
FROM
  releases
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(release_time)

WITH r AS (
	select 
		count(version) as releases
	from
		releases
	where $__timeFilter(release_time)
	),
	d AS (
	select
		count(distinct(version)) as deployed_releases
	from
		deployments
	where environment ilike 'prod%' AND $__timeFilter(deployment_time)
	)
SELECT
	d.deployed_releases::float/r.releases::float as ratio
FROM
	r, d;

SELECT
  release_time AS "time",
  1
FROM releases
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(release_time)
ORDER BY 1,2

WITH one AS (
	SELECT
		repository,
		environment,
		deployment_time,
		lag(deployment_time) OVER (ORDER BY repository, environment, deployment_time) AS previous_deployment_time,
		deployment_time - lag(deployment_time) OVER (ORDER BY repository, environment, deployment_time) AS diff
	FROM deployments
	),
	two AS (
	SELECT
		repository,
		environment,
		deployment_time,
		case when extract (epoch from diff) > 0 then extract (epoch from diff) else 0 end as diff_seconds
	FROM one
	)
SELECT
  percentile_cont(0.5) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY diff_seconds) as median,
  stddev_pop(diff_seconds) as stddev
FROM two
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(deployment_time) AND environment ilike 'prod%'

SELECT
  count(1)
FROM
  deployments
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(deployment_time) AND environment ilike 'stag%'

SELECT
  start_time as "time",
  split_part(environment, '-', 1) as metric,
  count(1) as value
FROM
  deployments
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time) AND repository='$repository'
GROUP BY 2,1

SELECT
  count(1)
FROM
  deployments
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(deployment_time) AND environment ilike 'prod%'

SELECT
  start_time as "time",
  split_part(environment, '-', 1) as metric,
  count(1) as value
FROM
  deployments
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time) AND repository='$repository'
GROUP BY 2,1

SELECT
  deployment_time AS "time",
  environment AS metric,
  1
FROM deployments
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(deployment_time)
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  start_time AS "time",
  context AS metric,
  duration
FROM pipelines
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time)
ORDER BY "time", metric ASC

SELECT
  start_time AS "time",
  context AS metric,
  duration
FROM pipelines
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time)
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
	(p.failed::decimal/p.total::decimal)*100 as rate,
	p.context
FROM
  (
  SELECT 
    count(1) AS total, 
    count(1) FILTER (WHERE status='Succeeded') AS success, 
    count(1) FILTER (WHERE status!='Succeeded') AS failed, 
    context 
  FROM pipelines 
  WHERE $__timeFilter(start_time) GROUP BY context
  ) as p
ORDER BY rate DESC
